chinese: ad！安全的；安心的 w.使安全；保护
english: secure

chinese: 我有很多杀毒软件来确保我电脑的安全。
english: I have a lot of anti-virus software to keep my computer secure

chinese: n.象牙；乳白色
english: ivory

chinese: 像这样交叉的象牙比较少见。
english: It is not very common to see ivory crossing with another like this

chinese: n.设施，设备
english: facility

chinese: 无障碍设施提高了残障人士的生活品质。
english: Accessibility facilities help improve the living standard of the disabled

chinese: n. 精确
english: precision

chinese: 这个仪器用于精密测量。
english: This is a high-precision tool for measurements

chinese: n，显示器；监视器；班长w.监视；监督；监测
english: monitor

chinese: 我想要一台新的纯平电脑显示器。
english: I want a new flat-screen computer monitor

chinese: adi聪明的；有发明天才的；有独创性的，别出心裁的
english: ingenious

chinese: 他是个聪明的小孩，总有很多好点子。
english: He's an ingenious boy who always has wonderful ideas

chinese: w收割；获得；收获
english: reap

chinese: 庄稼已经完全成熟，是时候收割了。
english: The crops are fully grown, and it's time to reap them

chinese: n.处方，药方
english: prescription

chinese: 医生把处方递给了病人。
english: The doctor passed the prescription to the patient

chinese: n.提高；激励：后推；助推发动机V增加；偷盗
english: boost

chinese: 如果你累了，喝点咖啡因饮料能提振精神。
english: If you are tired, you can drink a caffeine drink to give you an energy boost

chinese: adj. 有形的
english: tangible

chinese: 房产和机器设备是有形资产，而股票和股份则不是。
english: Property and machinery are tangible assets, whereas stocks and shares aren't

chinese: adj.固有的
english: intrinsic

chinese: 自信是这个人的内在品质。
english: Confidence is a quality which is intrinsic to this man

chinese: n.杠杆作用；杠杆效率
english: leverage

chinese: 他运用杠杆之力来移动这块巨石。
english: He used leverage to move the boulder

chinese: n.一连串；系列，系列节目；连续比赛
english: series

chinese: 一连串巧合的事件导致玻璃被打碎。
english: A series of coinciding incidents resulted in the glass-breaking

chinese: n. 拘谨
english: inhibition

chinese: 一开始她很害羞，但跟他熟了以后她就克服了自己的拘谨。
english: She was shy at first, but overcame her inhibitions once she got to know him

chinese: n.闲暇，休闲
english: leisure

chinese: 这个忙碌的员工只在周未有些闲暇时光。
english: The busy employee enjoys his leisure time only on the weekends

chinese: adv大概，据推测，可能
english: presumably

chinese: 凶手大概是个戴眼镜且会抽烟的男人。
english: The murderer is presumably a man who wears glasses and smokes
